GET /api.description: Serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the API

GET /api/mot-history/:vrn.description: Retrieves MOT history details for a vehicle registration number

GET /api/garage-chains/:id.description: Retrieves a single garage chain by its id

GET /api/garage-chains/:chain_id/branche.description: Retrieves all branches in a garage chain

GET /api/branches/:id.description: Retrieves a single branch by its id

GET /api/users/:id.description: Retrieves a single user by its id

GET /api/operating-hours/branch/:branch_.description: Retrieves all operating hours for a branch

GET /api/operating-hours/:id.description: Retrieves a single operating hour record by its id

POST /api/operating-hours.description: Creates a new operating hour record

PATCH /api/operating-hours/:id.description: Updates an existing operating hour record

DELETE /api/operating-hours/:id.description: Deletes an existing operating hour record

GET /api/operating-hours-override/:id.description: Retrieves a single operating-hours override by its id

GET /api/branches/:branch_id/operating-h.description: Retrieves overrides for a branch on a specific date

GET /api/booking-types/branch/:branch_id.description: Retrieves all booking types from a branch

GET /api/booking-types/:id.description: Retrieves a single booking type by its id

GET /api/bookings/:id.description: Retrieves a single booking by its id

GET /api/bookings/branch/:branch_id.description: Retrieves all bookings from a branch

GET /api/bookings/branch/:branch_id/date.description: Retrieves all bookings from a branch on a specific date

GET /api/bookings/user/email/:email.description: Retrieves all bookings made by a user with a specific email

GET /api/bookings/user/search/:name.description: Searches all bookings by a user's name

GET /api/booking-blocks/:id.description: Retrieves a single booking block by its id

GET /api/booking-blocks/branch/:branch_i.description: Retrieves all booking blocks for a branch
Retrieves all booking blocks for a branch on a specific date
